protocol.text: Arabidopsis plants were seeded and grown in soil at 22-26 Â°C in an 8 hr light/16 hr dark regime (under Phillips F40CW 34W fluorescent lights, with an intensity of 55 ¼mol m-2 sec-1).
Biotinylated cRNA was prepared according to the standard Affymetrix protocol from 4 ug total RNA.

RNA was isolated using the Invitrogen Trizol Reagent (cat 15596-018) and further purified with the Qiagen RNeasy Plant Mini Kit (cat 74903), and tested for quality by gel electrophoresis and inspection of the stable RNA bands.
